member.summary: Opens a connection to the database and establishes a query operation, returning a token to be used for subsequent data requests.
member.param: Filter expression to be used for the query.
Parameters to be used for the query.
Expiration time for the query data, in minutes, if not accessed. Defaults to 1 minute if not provided.
Cancellation token to cancel the operation.
